code: import React from"react";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import LocalMovieData from"../data/localData";import{MovieTital}from"../store/counterSlice";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import"./movie.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function MovielList(){var MovieData=LocalMovieData;var dispatch=useDispatch();var navigation=useNavigate();var handelclick=function handelclick(ele){dispatch(MovieTital(ele));navigation("/Booking");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"movielist",children:MovieData.map(function(el,key){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"movie",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:el.Poster,height:"350px",width:"90%"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:el.Title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn",onClick:function onClick(){return handelclick(el.Title);},children:"BOOK MOVIE "})]},key);})});}export default MovielList;
